Text: @GoodFilms: How about finishing seeding your other torrents before continually uploading new ones? Still waiting on Les Miserables at 50.2%. Very poor uploader.
les mis was ages ago and that was one torrent and i deleted it. move on :)

So, why bother uploading the torrent in the first place if you had no intention in finishing it? There were over 1000 people stuck on 50.2% last weekend. It would be greatly appreciated if you could finish it.
shut up and be grateful for all the other torrents that work. a working version of les mis will appear soonish. PS i have nothing positive to say about YOUR uploads.
At least my uploads were seeded to completion GoodFilms - or should your name be HalfFilms?;)
but nobody wants them. witty remark there btw. nearly fell off my chair.
